attributes.action: To ammend the Housing Act to ensure people on housing benefits do not get forced into debt when evicted from private accomodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/housingbenefit/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
